extendedInfo.description: Guitar Partner is a guitar tablature player and editor: - Tablature editor - Score Viewer - Fretboard display (left handed option) - Chords selector - Multitrack display - Autoscroll while playing - Zoom - Metronome - Tempo modification - Supported files format Guitar Pro 1/2/3/4/5/6 (GPX), Power Tab, TuxGuitar, TEF - Search tablatures directly from web (utimate-guitar.com)Log: http://datoh.com/guitarpartner/changelog

reviews.title: Ive owned this app
reviews.comment: For a few years and ive noticed that it tends to freeze up very often.  Its quite irritating. Besides that, its alright.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs an Update
reviews.comment: I believe this might need an update. This app worked great on my old Samsung Galaxy S, but it locks up before reaching the second measure when used on an HTC Vivid.  I considered this a five star program until I installed it on my new phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.comment: Slow studdered play back, takes a long time to make edits or changes to parts due to not being able to use the number key pad, no shortcuts in notes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I think its gotten worse.
reviews.comment: I remembered why I stopped trying to use this app. Horrible sound, horrible timing, and generally unresponsive. Great idea, but lousy execution. Razr Maxx w/ ics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No reviews given!

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: The app had me fooled since purchase. It definitwly has potential but there are many flaws. Muted notes, delay, and the one that got me the most: blank saved file. I recently started working on 2 separate files. Had a few great ideas for a song(s). I decided to open the file but there i discovered a blank screen without any notation or tabs. just blank. This issue is very inadequate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad quality
reviews.comment: Very bad sound quality. Also all added note modulations like bends,harmonics,and volume fades are not played. The only good working feature is the search and thats the only reason this app has earned 1 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer works on Atrix II. No response from developer
reviews.comment: Worked on Atrix I. If response and update, rating will be improved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs an update
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on nexus 7. Worked OK on my HTC thunderbolt.

reviews.title: Pretty much perfect
reviews.comment: Works great with gp files. That\'s all I needed

reviews.title: Impressive!
reviews.comment: I have Guitar Pro 6 and this app plays back everything smoother than expected! Downloads work great too! Samsung Epic 4G.

reviews.comment: The main reason i bought this app was for the guitar pro files, doesn\'t work on my xoom, just force close straight away.

reviews.comment: I don\'t understand how your supposed to download the tabs from in the app I search and nothing comes up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Don\'t buy! Ultimate guitar doesn\'t allow this 3rd party software to open its tabs anymore. Instead it locks up your phone!
